title: Marking of isolating switches
fullText:
All isolating switches controlling the portions of the installation included in Clause 2.4.1 shall be marked in accordance with AS/NZS 3000 and as follows:
(a)	'MAIN SWITCH'—on main switchboards.
(b)	'DISTRIBUTION BOARD ISOLATING SWITCH'—on distribution boards.
(c)	'ISOLATING SWITCH AFTER HOURS SUPPLY—DO NOT SWITCH OFF'—for
circuits supplying electrical equipment operating out of normal working hours. Main switches for safety services shall be identified in accordance with AS/NZS 3000.
